text: @GregAbbott_TX Four justices on the Texas Supreme Court just fired a shot across the bow of government officials continuing draconian COVID-19 restrictions in Texas. Justices Blacklock, Guzman, Boyd, and Devine the “Constitution is not suspended when the government declares a state of disaster.
